aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.styleTitle: Welcome to Cartsy - Where Style Meets Simplicity.
aboutUs.styleContent: At Cartsy, we believe shopping should be effortless, enjoyable, and inspiring. Founded in 2023 by a passionate team of tech-savvy retail experts and design enthusiasts, Cartsy was born out of a simple idea: to create a smarter way to shop online. We're more than just an e-commerce platform - we're a community-first shopping destination that connects people with curated collections of fashion, home goods, beauty, gadgets, and everyday essentials, all in one place.
aboutUs.missionContent: To redefine the online shopping experience by making it more personalized, efficient, and joyful. We combine cutting-edge technology with intuitive design to help our customers discover products they love - faster and easier.

first.title: Curated Collections
first.content: We don't just stock items - we curate them. Every product on Cartsy is handpicked by our team for quality, style, and value.

second.title: Smart Shopping
second.content: Our AI-powered recommendation engine tailors your shopping experience based on your taste, preferences, and shopping habits.

third.title: Fast & Reliable Delivery
third.content: With our advanced logistics partnerships, we ensure your orders arrive safely and swiftly, no matter where you are.

fourth.title: Sustainability Focus
fourth.content: We work closely with eco-conscious brands and strive to reduce our environmental footprint through greener packaging and operations.

help.title: How can we assist you today?
help.content: At Cartsy, your satisfaction is our top priority. Whether you're tracking an order, making a return, or just have a quick question â€” we're here to help. Below, you'll find answers to the most frequently asked questions. If you need more personalized support, don't hesitate to reach out!
help.stillNeedHelp: Still need help? We've got your back.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.question: Still need help? We've got your back.
contact.ending: We're always here for you - thanks for shopping with Cartsy!
